## Quantile Regression

Visualization of quantile regression data

```{r, Imports, echo=FALSE}
library(sjPlot)
library(haven)
library(tidyverse)
library(equatiomatic)
library(fastDummies)
library(pscl)

library(gsheet)
library(brant)
library(MASS)
library(lmtest)
library(reshape2)

library(nnet)
library(AER)
library(boot)

library(asaur)
```

```{r, 'Getting Data'}
df <- data2 <- read.csv("prostateSurvival.csv") |>
  na.omit()

head(df)

df |> count(status)
df |> count(stage)
df |> count(ageGroup)
df |> count(grade)

df$grade <- as.factor(df$grade)
df |> count(grade)
df <- dummy_cols(df, select_columns = "stage")
head(df)
df <- dummy_cols(df, select_columns = "ageGroup")
head(df)
```

```{r, 'Visualizing'}
df |> ggplot(aes(x = survTime)) +
  geom_bar() +
  xlab("Survial time") +
  theme_bw()

df |> ggplot(aes(x = survTime, y = as.factor(ageGroup), color = as.factor(status), shape = as.factor(stage))) +
  geom_point(size = 0.9) +
  ylab("Age group (years)") +
  xlab("Survial time") +
  labs(color = "Status", shape = "Stage") +
  theme_bw()
```
